Introduction

Woo Jin Young is a South Korean rapper and songwriter. He is the former maknae of the boy group D1CE.

He made his solo debut on June 9, 2021 with his first mini album [3-2=A].

On February 24, 2024 he took to social media to announce that he will be enlisting on March 4, 2024.
